summary: An experimental retelling of the story of Adam and Eve which then progresses into an allegorical depiction of loss of innocence.
cast: Jitka Nováková|Karel Novak|Jan Schmid|Julius Albert|Alice Auspergerová|Jan Klusák|Helena Ruzicková|Ludek Sobota|Josef Somr|Jaromír Vomácka
title: Ovoce stromu rajských jíme
